dkeep.logic

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents the game itself, all the elements are controlled by this class
    See Also:

        Game constructor

    • Method Detail

      • createDungeon

        public GameObject[][] createDungeon(int dungeonIdentifier,
                                    int[][] dungeonModel)
        Creates a matrix composed by all game elements represented by objects
        Parameters:
        dungeonIdentifier - the current game level
        dungeonModel - a matrix with all the game elements, except they are represented as numbers and not as objects
        Returns:
        returns a matrix with all the game elements, now represented as objects

      • getDungeon

        public Dungeon getDungeon()
        Returns:
        returns the game dungeon

      • printDungeonString

        public java.lang.String printDungeonString()
        Returns:
        returns the game dungeon in a string format

      • getHero

        public Hero getHero()
        Returns:
        returns the game hero character

      • playerTurn

        public boolean playerTurn(java.lang.String heroMovement)
        Moves the hero and changes all other elements accordingly
        Parameters:
        heroMovement - string that represents the hero's moving direction for the current turn
        Returns:
        returns true if the hero is alive AND the current level hasn't yet been finished, returns false otherwise

      • heroAttack

        public void heroAttack()
        This function is responsible for letting the hero stun the ogres

      • npcsAttack

        public void npcsAttack()
        Lets all the other characters attack(kill) the hero

      • npcsMovement

        public void npcsMovement()
        Moves all npcs currently in game

      • InteractionStateMachine

        public boolean InteractionStateMachine(Character character,
                                       GameObject nextTile,
                                       Point characterNextCoord)
        Determines what happens in the dungeon based on the character currently being analyzed and the tile he will move to
        Parameters:
        character - the game character we're currently analyzing
        nextTile - the tile to where the character will move
        characterNextCoord - the coordinates to where the character will move
        Returns:
        returns true if the current level hasn't yet been finished, returns false if it has been finished

      • changeDoors

        public void changeDoors()
        Unlocks(opens) all current game doors
